p: The tea waste (TW) char was synthesized using the chemical activation method. Briefly, 20 g of tea waste was soaked in 10% orthophosphoric acid (H3PO4) solution for 12 h activation of the tea char waste. After the specified time, it was dried at room temperature and saved for calcination prior to sulfonation. The dried TW powder was carbonized under a stream of N2 by raising the temperature to 700 °C for 2 h with a heating rate increase of 5 °C/min.
